trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上的医生是谁？他们都是信誉良好的美国拥有执业执照的医生吗？他们是如何被挑选的？

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上所有的医生都持有用药证书并且有良好的信誉。他们包括美国顶级医学院（比如斯坦福和哈佛）的医生，也包括美国的私人医生。HealthTap的医学专家独立于第三方，他们并不受雇或附属于HealthTap。只有申请或受邀才能进入HealthTap网站。

trans-unit.source: A new important hub for your health, SmartHealth gives you access to doctor approved health information, a free online doctor service in the evenings and weekends, and the chance to have your hospital appointment in your own home from any mobile device or personal computer.
trans-unit.target: 有一个新的重要枢纽为您的健康服务，SmartHealth可以让您访问医生批准的健康信息，在晚上和周末提供免费的在线医生服务，以及通过任何移动设备或个人计算机在您自己的家中预约您的医院。

trans-unit.source: You can also get advice, tips and checklists to help meet your health goals.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以获得建议，小贴士和清单，以帮助实现您的健康目标。

trans-unit.source: If you want to talk to a doctor for free in the evenings and at weekends, please hit the "get help now" tab once you have set up your account.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在晚上和周末免费与医生交谈，请在设置好您的帐户后点击“立即获得帮助”按钮。

trans-unit.source: EDIT YOUR QUESTION <span class="sub_title">Want to change your question? You can do that here. Remember, proper grammar and correct spelling increase your chances of getting a great answer!
trans-unit.target: 编辑您的问题 <span class=”sub_title”>想要更改您的问题吗？您可以在这里做。记住，正确的语法和正确的拼写可以增加获得一个优秀的回答的机会！

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINESTo ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 指南 要提出一个优秀的HealthTap问题，请使用这些有帮助的指南

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little.Hide examples
Good:I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good:Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
更多的细节...至少有一点。隐藏范例
好：在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？这可能由什么导致？
不太好： 为什么我有一个皮疹？

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.Show examples
Good:What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good:Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
使（您的问题描述）尽可能长这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的答案。显示范例
好： 是什么导致在家里做家务后会后背疼 - 我的背部从来没有受过伤？
不太好： 什么背疼？

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant.Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary:What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
当相关时，包括性别。显示范例
性别有帮助:什么可能导致男人胸部下面一个四分之一大小的肿块？
不需要性别：在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age.Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers:For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
包括一个适当的年龄。显示范例
不同的年龄段有不同的解答： 前两天，我15岁的儿子发烧了，而且走路一瘸一拐的，好像腿受了伤一样。哪些东西可能导致这种情况？
为什么前两天我3岁的孩子发着烧，走路还一瘸一拐，好像腿受了一样呢？使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.Show examples
Good:My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good:My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。显示范例
好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄这个身高体重正常吗？
不太好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.Show examples
Good:My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good:My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
请同时使用药物的商标名和通用名称，尤其当您不在美国或问及不常见的药物时。显示范例
好：我5岁大的儿子，55磅，正在发烧。他服用5ml的泰诺（对乙酰氨基酚120mg / 5ml），但还在发烧。体重和年龄这么大的孩子可以服用更大剂量的泰诺吗？
不太好:我的儿子5岁，体重55，有一点发烧。已服用过泰诺但还在发烧。服用更多泰诺吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.Show examples
Good:How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good:Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
尽量避免提问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。显示范例
好：抗生素如何在年轻的学龄儿童中起作用？
不太好：抗生素对儿童起作用吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out.Show examples
Good:Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good:Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
尝试留下意见显示范例
好： 为什么有些人会抵抗疫苗，明明疫苗可以用来预防疾病？
不太好：那些反疫苗的人是彻底地不懂还是只是拒绝接受？

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.Show examples
Good:I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good:Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
越清楚越好。运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。显示范例
好：我当时正在锻炼手臂，然后感到二头肌处有火烧一样的疼痛。我是肌肉撕裂了吗？
不太好：做弯举，感觉不对和胳膊受伤？

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.Show examples
Good:My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good:And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
不要假设个人的历史知识。HealthTap的医生经常不会看到您以前的问题。显示范例
好： 我两岁的儿子两个月前得了耳管炎，现在还发烧了，右耳会流脓。这正常吗？
不太好： 这种症状已经持续两天，也一直有浓流出来吗？

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).Show examples
Good:I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good:Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
为了保护隐私，请不要留下您的姓名和他人的姓名（“其他”除已公开谈论某个问题的名人的名字）。显示范例
好：我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。在过去三年里有新的，好的治疗方法面世吗？
不太好： 您好，医生。我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.Show examples
Good:How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good:How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
避免使用太多的缩写，因为可能导致混淆显示范例
好：如果您没有来生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？
不太好：如果您没有正常的生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.Show examples
Good:I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good:Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
用英语询问。这是HealthTap医生的常用语言。显示范例
好：我上周末修剪了一些树木，我的手臂已经疼了2天。这可能由什么引起？
不太好：因为我的胳膊很疼吗？

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the "Hidden Powers of Smiling" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into over 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首席执行官和创始人Ron Gutman的TED演讲“微笑的隐藏力量”在2011年的会议上取得了巨大反响，但是演讲的最终成功来源于在线发布。今天，这场演讲已被数以百万计的人观看过，被世界各地热心的观众翻译成50多种语言，并作为TED图书出版。

trans-unit.source: The first response to an inquiry on HealthTap came from a New Jersey pediatrician, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, who answered the question: "Should I be concerned about my baby's previous vaccinations?"
trans-unit.target: 对HealthTap调查的第一个回复来自新泽西州的儿科医生Anatoloy Belilovsky医生，他回答了这个问题：“我应该关心我宝宝以前接种过的疫苗吗？

trans-unit.source: HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and over 330,000 global views. The event, themed "Living by Numbers," focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor and Tim O'Reilly.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap对赞助TEDx硅谷感到自豪，这是世界上观看最多的TEDx活动，在50个国家拥有实时流媒体观众和超过33万的全球观点。该活动主题为“数字生活”，主要关注数字如何影响和改善我们的日常生活和独具特色的演讲者，如Chris Anderson，Mitch Kapor和Tim O'Reilly。

trans-unit.source: "5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app that quickly changed the face of instant access to health information.
trans-unit.target: “5000名医生，就在您的指尖 - 在家里或在旅途中”成为新的HealthTap快速应用程序发布的座右铭。与医生面对面的应用程序（HealthTap Express MD）一起，把HealthTap的核心问答功能嵌入在一个新奇的和有吸引力的移动应用程序，这个程序可以迅速改变即时访问的健康信息的现状。

trans-unit.source: When a doctor feels an answer from another physician is right on target, they can "agree" with it – immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!
trans-unit.target: 当一位医生觉得另一位医生的回答是正确时，他们可以“同意”此回答 – 此举可以立即提高回答的可信度。得到最多认同的回答将被置顶并被用户找到！

trans-unit.source: Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our "I <3 My Doc" campaign – celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络在2012年初达到了10000名医生的容量 - 它仍然在增长！这个里程碑的时刻恰巧与情人节一起，在我们发起我们的“I <3 My Doc”活动的时候 - 庆祝医生无所不在的努力工作和照顾他人的奉献精神。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's award winning display at the first ever Developer Block Party (sponsored by the city of Palo Alto) featured in person doctors answering health questions of the thousands of people who stopped by our "Doctor is In" parklet.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在第一次的开发者团队（由帕洛阿尔托市赞助）的获奖显示特色医生亲自回答数千人的健康问题，我们的医生是休息的休憩站。

trans-unit.source: Karl is the CEO and Founder of Coveroo. Previously, he was the CEO of Cloudmark, an entrepreneur-in-residence at Benchmark Capital, and founded and built companies including Dimension X (acquired by Microsoft) and Keen (Ingenio) (acquired by AT&T). He has been named one of BusinessWeek's "top ten up-and-comers,” and was an early advisor to Facebook.
trans-unit.target: Karl是Coveroo的首席执行官和创始人。在此之前，他是Cloudmark的首席执行官，Benchmark Capital的企业家，并成立和创建了包括Dimension X（被微软收购）和Keen（Ingenio）（被AT&T收购）的公司。他被BusinessWeek评为“十大上线客户”之一，并且是Facebook的早期顾问。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the 'consumerization' of Healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap体现了强大的消费者互联网趋势，将高价值的主流离线体验（如医生与患者之间的互动）转移到在线世界。公司利用我最激动的三个关键创新驱动因素：通过智能手机和平板电脑实现新型丰富的个性化互动的移动应用程序; 增强用户参与和保留的游戏化; 和如基于专家的问与答和声誉图的社会机制，促进深厚的兴趣和信任。这种新鲜的思维将加速健康医护的“消费化”，并重新激发一个极其重要且有价值的行业，它已经隐藏在IT曲线背后并陷入几十年的无效率之中。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is important because it's a source for well-balanced, medically appropriate information on the web to counter some of the false claims and misinformation.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap很重要，因为它是一个网络上明智的，符合医学规范的对抗一些虚假的声明和错误信息的来源。

trans-unit.source: I enjoy answering the important questions that are really on patient's minds.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢回答在患者心中真正重要的问题。

trans-unit.source: The public is constantly consulting 'Dr. Google,' why not give them hundreds of great answers from medical experts?
trans-unit.target: 公众正在不断咨询“Google医生”，为什么不给他们来自医学专家的数百个优秀的回答？

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap website is an exciting and promising new way for physician experts to share trusted information to parents in a way that is user-friendly. I'm excited to see this new forum for exchanging medical information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap网站是一个令人兴奋和有前途的新方式，方便专家医师向父母分享值得信任的信息。我很高兴看到在这个新的论坛交流医疗信息。

trans-unit.source: Ask a simple question, get a simple answer, from someone you can depend on. That's the kind of education that parents can really use.
trans-unit.target: 询问一个简单的问题，从一个您可以依靠的人得到一个简单的回答。这才是父母真正有用的教育。

trans-unit.source: So where do medical students come in? I'll see a patient question pop up on the website, and I can submit a draft of the answer. A physician will then edit what I submitted and publish it on the site. It has been a fantastic learning experience for me, as I frequently have to do some research in order to answer the question. The physician editing process mirrors what actually happens in real life when I present a patient during morning rounds. In the hospital, some of the physicians in the hospital will tear my presentation apart, correcting me or questioning everything I say, while other docs just let me present and tell me I did a good job after.
trans-unit.target: 那么医学学生进入的地方是什么呢？我会在网站上看到一个突然出现的患者问题，我可以提交回答草稿。然后医生将编辑我提交的内容并在网站上发布。这对我来说是一个奇妙的学习经历，因为我经常需要做一些研究，以回答这个问题。医生编辑过程反映了我在真实生活中给患者查房的经历。在医院，医院里的一些医师会撕掉我的演讲稿，纠正我或质疑我所说的一切，然而这些文件只是让我展示并告诉我，我做得很好。

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is important because it's a source for well-balanced, medically appropriate information on the web to counter some of the false claims and misinformation."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap很重要，因为它是一个网络上明智的，符合医学规范的对抗一些虚假的声明和错误信息的来源。”

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is a platform for me to participate in patient education. Indeed, it's also a place where doctors can learn pearls from each other, and that's very valuable."
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是我可以参与患者教育的平台。事实上，它也是一个医生可以彼此相互学习的珍贵的地方，这是非常有价值的。

trans-unit.source: "I enjoy answering the important questions that are really on patient's minds."
trans-unit.target: “我喜欢回答在患者心中真正重要的问题。”

trans-unit.source: "The public is constantly consulting 'Dr. Google,' why not give them hundreds of great answers from medical experts?"
trans-unit.target: “公众正在不断咨询“Google医生”，为什么不给他们来自医学专家的数百个优秀的回答？”

trans-unit.source: "The HealthTap website is an exciting and promising new way for physician experts to share trusted information to parents in a way that is user-friendly. I'm excited to see this new forum for exchanging medical information."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap网站是一个令人兴奋和有前途的新方式，方便专家医师向父母分享值得信任的信息。我很高兴看到在这个新的论坛交流医疗信息。

trans-unit.source: Through video, voice, and text chat on any smartphone, tablet, or personal computer, we connect millions around the world with the most trusted health advice from a network of more than %{num} top doctors. We enable universal access to the right care at the right time at the right price.

trans-unit.source: Try entering different prices and numbers of consults into the calculator on the "Set Pricing" page to see how much you can earn. For example, if you set your 15-minute live consult price to $50 and do just 5 consults each week, you'll earn an additional $10,400/year.

trans-unit.source: Have you ever had an application for a license denied or refused, withdrawn an application for a license, certificate, or registration, or for a disciplinary reason agreed not to reapply for a license, certificate, or registration in any profession, state, or jurisdiction?

trans-unit.source: Have you, or any license or right to practice held by you, been disciplined, restricted, or surrendered by any U.S. state, territory, federal agency, or foreign country?
trans-unit.target: 您，或者您持有的执业执照或行医资格是否曾被美国任何州，领地，联邦机构或外国的纪律处分，限制或被要求交出？

trans-unit.source: Were you ever subject to disciplinary action or placed on probation anyplace you provided medical care? Have you ever held medical privileges that were revoked, suspended, not renewed, or limited?
trans-unit.target: 您是否曾经受到纪律处分或在任何地方提供医疗医护而被判缓刑？您是否曾经被撤销，暂停使用，不续约或限制医疗特权？

trans-unit.source: Has your membership, participation, clinical privileges or employment related to your medical career ever been denied, terminated, stipulated, restricted, refused, limited, suspended, revoked, or not renewed, or is there a review currently pending?
trans-unit.target: 您的医疗职业相关的会员资格，参与资格，临床特权或雇佣是否曾被拒绝，终止，规范，约束，拒绝，限制，暂停，撤销或不续约，或者是否有正待解决的审核？

trans-unit.source: Were you ever arrested, charged with a misdemeanor or felony, indicted, found guilty, or entered a plea of guilty or nolo contendere in a criminal prosecution under the laws of any state of the United States whether or not any sentence was actually imposed? Include matters that have been expunged.
trans-unit.target: 您是否曾经被逮捕，被控犯有轻罪或重罪，被起诉，被判有罪，或根据美国任何州的法律在刑事起诉中提出有罪或异议，无论是否实际判处刑罚？ 包括已被删除的事项。

trans-unit.source: Are you aware of any physical or mental conditions which may limit your ability to perform the responsibilities of the position you are applying for?
trans-unit.target: 您知道任何可能限制您履行您申请职位职责的能力的身体或精神状况吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you ever been addicted to any substance, or enrolled in, required to enter into, or participated in any drug or alcohol recovery program, or impaired practitioner program for treatment of drugs or alcohol abuse?
trans-unit.target: 您是否曾经对任何物质上瘾，或卷入，被要求进入，或者自愿参加任何药物或酒精恢复项目，或治疗药物或酒精滥用的项目？

trans-unit.source: Are you currently bound by the terms of a non-compete agreement that will limit your ability to provide medical services to other parties? If so, where does the restriction apply?
trans-unit.target: 您目前是否受到不竞争协议的条款，即限制您向其他方提供医疗服务能力的约束？如果是，限制的范围是什么？

trans-unit.source: Are you aware of any event, plans or history that would delay or interrupt your ability to provide medical services with HealthTap in the next two years?
trans-unit.target: 您是否知道任何事件，计划或过去事实会延迟或中断您在未来两年内使用HealthTap提供医疗服务的能力？

trans-unit.source: Do you know of any reasons why your licensing applications in any state might be rejected or revoked?
trans-unit.target: 您知道您在任何州的执业执照申请被拒绝或撤销的可能原因吗？

trans-unit.source: Please list the times that you've been named as a defendant in a medical malpractice case, been notified of a claim or notice of intent (or in any such cases currently pending). Please indicate how each matter was resolved, or if it is still pending.
trans-unit.target: 请列出您在医疗事故案件中被指控为被告的时间，被通知索赔或意向通知（或在任何此类目前待解决的案件）。请说明每个问题是如何解决的，或者它仍然等待解决。

trans-unit.source: Have you ever had an application for a license denied or refused, withdrawn an application for a license, certificate, or registration, or, for a disciplinary reason, agreed not to reapply for a license, certificate, or registration in any profession, state, or jurisdiction?

trans-unit.source: Have you been disciplined, or has any license or right to practice held by you been restricted or surrendered, by any U.S. state, territory, federal agency, or foreign country?

trans-unit.source: Have you ever been subject to disciplinary action or placed on probation where you provided medical care; or held medical privileges that were revoked, suspended, not renewed, or limited?

trans-unit.source: Have you ever had any membership or participation rights, clinical privileges or employment related to your medical career: denied, terminated, stipulated, restricted, refused, limited, suspended, revoked, not renewed, or is such a review currently pending?

trans-unit.target: 您曾经有过被逮捕，被控重罪，被起诉，被判有罪，或根据美国任何州的法律在刑事起诉中提出有罪或异议，无论是否实际判处刑罚？

trans-unit.target: 您是否曾经对任何物质上瘾，或卷入，被要求进入，或者自愿参加任何药物或酒精恢复项目或治疗药物或酒精的项目？

trans-unit.target: 医生曾经有过被逮捕，被控重罪，被起诉，被判有罪，或根据美国任何州的法律在刑事起诉中提出有罪或异议，无论是否实际判处刑罚？

trans-unit.source: Are you aware of any physical or mental conditions which may limit the doctor's ability to perform virtual consults under the applicable standard of care?
trans-unit.target: 医生是否知道任何身体或精神状况可能会限制您根据适用的医护标准进行在线咨询的能力？

trans-unit.source: Has the doctor ever been addicted to any substance, or enrolled in, required to enter into, or participated in any drug or alcohol recovery program, or impaired practitioner program for treatment of drugs or alcohol abuse?
trans-unit.target: 医生是否曾经对任何物质上瘾，或卷入，被要求进入，或者自愿参加任何药物或酒精恢复项目，或治疗药物或酒精滥用的项目？

trans-unit.source: Do you know of any reasons why the doctor's licensing applications in any state might be rejected or revoked?
trans-unit.target: 您知道医生在任何州的执业执照申请被拒绝或撤销的可能原因吗？

trans-unit.source: Is the doctor currently a named defendant in a pending medical malpractice case or have they been notified of any claim or notice of intent for an action that could be filed?
trans-unit.target: 医生目前是未决医疗事故案件中的指定被告，或者他们已收到任何可能提交的诉讼的任何声明或意向通知吗？

trans-unit.source: In the last 10 years has the doctor been named as a defendant in a medical malpractice claim resolved for over $50,000?
